title: Aurora chaser catches a fox basking in the glow of Finland's legendary 'fox fires' (photos)
description: A magical encounter in northern Finland blends ancient folklore, swirling auroras and an unexpectedly curious fox.
content: A magical encounter in northern Finland blends ancient folklore, swirling auroras and an unexpectedly curious fox.
